hero.title: FOCUS MORE. STRESS LESS.
hero.description: As a dentist, your time is valuable, and managing your clinic can be tough.

services.p: Connecting dentists, Labs and Stores for smarter collaboration.

private.title: Private Dental Community
private.description: Full privacy: A secure and private space for dental professionals. Professional connections: Connect with dentists for advice, collaboration, or help. Online marketplace: Compare prices and order materials from multiple stores.

plan.title: Plan Like a Pro
plan.description: Daily planning: Easily schedule tasks and patient appointments. Supply management: Track and manage your dental materials.

finance.title: Manage Your Finances
finance.description: Expense tracking: Monitor material costs. Income management: Track your earnings daily, weekly, or yearly. Payment reminders: Track patients and payments with automatic reminders.

opportunity.title: Top Dentist Opportunity
opportunity.description: Showcase Your Expertise: As a top dentist, you will have the opportunity to give online lectures and share your knowledge with other dental professionals. Grow Your Reputation: Build a strong presence and gain recognition by offering valuable insights and high-level courses through our platform. Exclusive Benefits for Top Dentists Monetize Your Knowledge: Offer paid lectures, workshops, or mentoring sessions for dentists looking to advance their skills.

courses.title: Advanced Dental Courses
courses.description: Learn more: Courses in English and specialized topics like Implant Dentistry with French, arabic subtitles. Dental News : Get the latest trends and news in the dental world.

growth.title: Business Growth Support
growth.description: Expert help to grow your online presence and social media, with special pricing.

plans.title: Regular Updates
plans.desc: Connect with dentists and explore career opportunities with our Zirconium plan.
plans.desc2: Share cases and collaborate with dentists worldwide.
